00019 typedef struct circBuffer {
00020         data_t *data;
00021         data_t *head;   //we could just use headIdx, but this way there's a
00022         idx_t headIdx;  //convenient pointer right to the end of the data
00023         length_t maxLen;
00024         float fractionPadding;
00025 } circBuffer;
00026
